state.text: Welcome To Estimate it! Push a button to start.
Your job is to find shapes scattered in the game area. When you find the right shape, push the corresponding button. For instance, push red to continue.
Now push green.
No, that was not green, push a button to try again.
Each person in your team will look for a different object. Ready to Start? Push any button to continue.
Find a cube with a face 5" long. Press the black button if you want a hint
Hint: A cube is a box with 6 square faces (a face is a side). Find a cube with a face 5” long. Push a button to continue.
Incorrect, press any button to try again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the cube. Press any button to continue.
Find a rectangular prism with its longest edge about 6”. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: A rectangular prism is like a shoebox. An edge is a border. Find a rectangular prism with longest edge about 6”. Push a button to continue.
Incorrect, press any button to try again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found a rectangular prism with longest edge of 6”. Push BLACK to continue.
Find a 6” tall cylinder. Press the black button if you want a hint.
I am a cylinder: My shape is like a soda can. Find a 6” tall cylinder. Push a button to continue.
Incorrect, press any button to try again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the cylinder. You found a 6” tall cylinder. Push BLACK to continue.
Now take your shape to the starting area. Press black to continue.
Great Job! You reached LEVEL 2 of the “Estimate it!” game. Push a button to continue.
Listen carefully to the organizers as they tell you about the 2nd part. Wait and do not push any buttons until you are told.
Work as a team to find as many shapes as you can. Push the black button to continue.
Find a volume about 6” wide, with no flat faces. Press the black button if you want a hint
Hint: I am a sphere, like a ball 6” tall. Find a shape about 6” wide, with no flat faces.
That was not the right color. Press a button to try entering the sequence again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the sphere. You found a volume with no flat faces. Push BLACK to continue.
Now WAIT for everybody in your team to enter colors for this object too. After everybody is done, press a button to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to finish this level.
Find a cube with sides 8" long. Press the black button if you want a hint.
I am a cube: all faces are squares (4 right angles and same length sides). Find a volume where each face has 4 right angles and all sides are 8” long.
That was not the right color. Press a button to try entering the sequence again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the cube. You found a volume with no flat faces. Push BLACK to continue.
Now WAIT for everybody in your team to enter colors for this object too. After everybody is done, press a button to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to find another object as a team.
Find a sphere about 5” tall. Press the black button if you want a hint
Hint: My shape is like a ball. This sphere is 5” tall. Place a stick vertically to help estimate.
That was not the right color... Try entering all colors again, or press BLACK for a hint.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the sphere. You found a sphere about 6” tall. Push BLACK to continue.
Now WAIT for everybody in your team to enter colors for this object too. After everybody is done, press a button to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to finish this level.
Find a triangular prism. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: A triangular prism is a three-sided prism, made of a triangular base, a translated copy, and 3 faces joining corresponding sides.
That was not the right color... Try entering all colors again, or press BLACK for a hint.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found a triangular prism. A volume with 5 faces, all acute angles. Push BLACK to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to finish this level.
G A M E O V E R . Thank you for playing “Estimate It!”
Find a cube with a face 3” long. Press the black button for a hint.
Hint: A cube is a box with 6 square faces (a face is a side). Find a cube with a face 3” long. Push a button to continue.
Incorrect, press any button to try again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the cube. Press any button to continue.
Find a sphere about 6” tall. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: I have the shape a ball. Put a stick next to me to measure my height. Find a sphere about 6” tall. Push a button to continue.
Incorrect, press any button to try again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the sphere. You found a sphere about 6” tall. Push BLACK to continue.
Find a rectangular prism with its longest edge about 11”. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: A rectangular prism is like a shoebox. An edge is a border. Find a rectangular prism with longest edge about 11”. Push a button to continue.
Incorrect, press any button to try again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the prism. A rectangular prism with longest edge about 11”. Push BLACK to continue.
Now take your shape to the starting area. Press black to continue.
Great Job! You reached LEVEL 2 of the “Estimate it!” game. Push a button to continue.
Listen carefully to the organizers as they tell you about the 2nd part. Wait and do not push any buttons until you are told.
Work as a team to find as many shapes as you can. Push the black button to continue.
Find a shape with 2 flat sides and 1 curved side, 8” tall. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: A cylinder has 2 flat round sides and 1 curved side (like a soda can). Find a shape with 2 flat sides and 1 curved side, 8” tall.
That was not the right color. Press a button to try entering the sequence again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the cylinder. A volume with 2 flat round sides and 1 curved side. Push BLACK to continue
Now WAIT for everybody in your team to enter colors for this object too. After everybody is done, press a button to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to finish this level.
Find a triangular prism. Press the black button if you want a hint.
A triangular prism is a three-sided prism, made of a triangular base, a translated copy, and 3 faces joining corresponding sides
That was not the right color. Press a button to try entering the sequence again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found a triangular prism. A volume with 4 faces, all acute angles. Push BLACK to continue.
Now WAIT for everybody in your team to enter colors for this object too. After everybody is done, press a button to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to find another object as a team.
Find a cube with a face 8” long. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: A cube is a box with 6 equal square faces. Find a cube with an face 8” long.
That was not the right color... Try entering all colors again, or press BLACK for a hint.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the cube. You found a cube with a face 8” long. Push BLACK to continue.
Now WAIT for everybody in your team to enter colors for this object too. After everybody is done, press a button to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to finish this level.
Find a sphere about 8” tall. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: I have the shape a ball. Put a stick next to me to measure my height. Find a sphere about 8” tall.
That was not the right color... Try entering all colors again, or press BLACK for a hint.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the sphere. You found a sphere about 8” tall. Push BLACK to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to finish this level.
Find a cube with a face 8” long. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: A cube is a box with 6 equal square faces. Find a cube with an face 8” long. Push a button to continue.
Incorrect, press any button to try again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the cube. You found a cube with a face 8” long. Push BLACK to continue.
Find a rectangular prism with its longest edge about 11” long. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: A rectangular prism’s shape is like a shoebox. Find a rectangular prism with longest edge about 11”. Push a button to continue.
Incorrect, press any button to try again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the prism. A rectangular prism with longest edge about 11”. Push BLACK to continue.
Find a sphere about 8” tall. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: My shape is like a ball. You can use a stick to measure my height. Find a sphere about 8” tall. Push a button to continue.
Incorrect, press any button to try again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You found a sphere about 8” tall. Push BLACK to continue.
Now take your shape to the starting area. Press black to continue.
Great Job! You reached LEVEL 2 of the “Estimate it!” game. Push a button to continue.
Listen carefully to the organizers as they tell you about the 2nd part. Wait and do not push any buttons until you are told.
Work as a team to find as many shapes as you can. Push the black button to continue.
Find a triangular prism. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: A triangular prism is a three-sided prism, made of a triangular base, a translated copy, and 3 faces joining corresponding sides.
That was not the right color. Press a button to try entering the sequence again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the triangular prism.
Now WAIT for everybody in your team to enter colors for this object too. After everybody is done, press a button to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to finish this level.
Find a rectangular prism: two of its faces are squares with 4” sides. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: 4” is one third of your 12” dowel. Look for that square face. Find a rectangular prism: two of its faces are squares (4” sides)
That was not the right color. Press a button to try entering the sequence again.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the rectangular prism! A rectangular prism with two square faces (side length= 4”)
Now WAIT for everybody in your team to enter colors for this object too. After everybody is done, press a button to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to find another object as a team.
Find a volume where each face has 4 right angles and all sides are 5” long. Press the black button if you want a hint.
Hint: I am a cube: all faces are squares (4 right angles and same length sides). Find a volume where each face has 4 right angles and all sides are 5” long.
That was not the right color... Try entering all colors again, or press BLACK for a hint.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the sphere. You found a volume with no flat faces. Push BLACK to continue.
Now WAIT for everybody in your team to enter colors for this object too. After everybody is done, press a button to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to finish this level.
Find a 6” tall cylinder. Press the black button if you want a hint.
I am a cylinder: My shape is like a soda can. Find a 6” tall cylinder.
That was not the right color... Try entering all colors again, or press BLACK for a hint.
Now enter the second color.
Now enter the third color.
Now enter the fourth color.
Congratulations! You have found the cylinder. You found a 6” tall cylinder. Push BLACK to continue.
Please take your team’s shape to the starting area. Then push BLACK to finish this level.
Welcome Team 1! Push any button to get your first clue.
Welcome Team 2! Push any button to get your first clue.
Welcome Team 3! Push any button to get your first clue.
